00028 #ifndef __SearchOps_H_
00029 #define __SearchOps_H_
00030 
00031 // Emulate _findfirst, _findnext on non-Windows platforms
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035 #include <string.h>
00036 #include <sys/types.h>
00037 #include <sys/stat.h>
00038 #include <stdlib.h>
00039 
00040 #include "OgrePlatform.h"
00041 
00042 
00043 #if OGRE_PLATFORM != OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00044 
00045 #include <dirent.h>
00046 #include <unistd.h>
00047 #include <fnmatch.h>
00048 
00049 /* Our simplified data entry structure */
00050 struct _finddata_t
00051 {
00052     char *name;
00053     int attrib;
00054     unsigned long size;
00055 };
00056 
00057 #define _A_NORMAL 0x00  /* Normalfile-Noread/writerestrictions */
00058 #define _A_RDONLY 0x01  /* Read only file */
00059 #define _A_HIDDEN 0x02  /* Hidden file */
00060 #define _A_SYSTEM 0x04  /* System file */
00061 #define _A_ARCH   0x20  /* Archive file */
00062 #endif
00063 #define _A_SUBDIR 0x10  /* Subdirectory */
00064 
00065 intptr_t _findfirst(const char *pattern, struct _finddata_t *data);
00066 int _findnext(intptr_t id, struct _finddata_t *data);
00067 int _findclose(intptr_t id);
00068 
00069 #endif
